content: left to right through front loops of these stitches and knit both together 1 stitch decreased ssp slip 2 stitches knitwise one at a time return sts to left needle and purl together through the back loops 1 stitch decreased st s stitch es st st stocking or stockinette stitch decrease together ws wrong side acknowledgements thank you to all the friends and family who have asked for and worn the harvie original leftovers jumper thanks i think to the friends and family who have kindly donated their own leftovers to add to my stash thank you too to the younger generation for asking for their own version your wish is my command please note this pattern has not been tech edited it has however been knitted in various versions several times by myself any errors are entirely my responsibility but if you find any please let me know please feel free to use this pattern as required to knit for friends family and charitable purposes page9 of 9 copyright © kate harvie all rights reserved for personal use only 13 august 2024
